name: Fire in the Sky
description: In an age when space travel is commonplace, alien abductions are no longer a concern to the people of Earth... are they? When reports of a new wave of abductions from above come in, Starfleet finds itself facing foes present and past.
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Kova Tholl, Cochrane, Alandra La Forge, Geordi La Forge, Sidney La Forge, Silva La Forge, EMH, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using Captain Proton's Rocket Ship, the U.S.S. Cochrane, or the Suurok Class Combat Cruiser will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Kova Tholl, Cochrane, Alandra La Forge, Geordi La Forge, Sidney La Forge, Silva La Forge, EMH

featured_crew.name: Samantha
featured_crew.flavor: Samantha served as a xenobiologist on the U.S.S. Voyager ship. Her life and family changed forever during her time in the Delta Quadrant.

featured_crew.name: Alandra
featured_crew.flavor: The spitting image of her father, Alandra follows in his footsteps, joining Starfleet and helping to maintain the Fleet Museum.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: La Forge
rewards.flavor: Chief Engineer of the Enterprise-D, Geordi La Forge was an important and gifted member of the crew.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser Ship Schematic
rewards.full_name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser Ship Schematic

ship.name: Suurok Class Combat Cruiser
ship.flavor: Used as both a Combat Cruiser or a Science Vessel, the Suurok Class was among the fastest and most powerful starships operating in the Vulcan fleet.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: Cochrane
rewards.flavor: A brilliant scientist, the words Doctor Cochrane left behind were a beacon for United Earthâ€™s future.

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Samantha
rewards.flavor: Samantha served as a xenobiologist on the U.S.S. Voyager ship. Her life and family changed forever during her time in the Delta Quadrant.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "Citizens of Earth. I know this most recent wave of disappearances has caused a great deal of alarm, but I assure you, we are working around the clock to--hey, wait, who are you? Unhand me! I'm just a--"
"And now he's gone too. I can't say I expected them to actually kidnap a hologram. I thought his idea to pretend to be someone in political power as bait was crazy. But it actually worked."

"So it did. Then again, there is little logic in any of this. How these abductions are managed when Earth is so tightly patrolled, what their aim is -- even the individuals they target don't always make sense."

"I don't think we'll get any answers waiting around. Captain, sorry to throw you in with so little context, but a fleet of ships just left Earth's atmosphere. One of them has our holographic President. Can you track him down, rescue him, and find out who's behind this?"
